\subsection*{Really Turned On}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{phxbot}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated & insufflated & Products - Bath Salts, Plant Food, etc & powder / crystals\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 200.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
 \#\#EROWID\_NOTE:PACKAGED\_PRODUCTS\_VARY\#\#  



11:30 -- bought two packs of Eight Ballz bath salt. snorted one half or 2.5 g; made mistake and snorted large amount.



11:45 -- put on porn, very excited but hard to achieve erection -- seems like meth dick



12:00 -- really kicking in; euphoria, sexual desire, feel very confident



12:15 -- really turned on by porn; extremely thirsty; watching porn as I write; I am biwm; would do anything for sex; left front door open to see if anyone would join me; nothing



1:00 --coming down; drinking several small bottles of water



1:15 -- snorted remaining half; not noticing a high but more of a mellow feeling; this is good



1:30 -- very sexual but still can't get it up; addicted to [] for porn



1:38 -- a bit jittery; still playing with myself



1:45 -- more jitters -- still can't get it up; will use when I bottom, but not top -- will use with guys not girls; keep drinking water but it does not help; on my 4th bottle of water (16 oz); mental facilities good, slight imbalance when walking; really turned on



2:00 -- coming down off high rapidly; feel very tired; will try to get some sleep; first will try to jack off; still very horny



[Reported Dose: `5 g']
